markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Admonishing Band](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1226)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Enchantment" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=61" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Talisman" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=155" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 184</row>

**Price** 20 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** affixed to a firearm

</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>envision</row></row>

 

 

**Requirement** You're trained in [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7).
</row>

</column>

---

This wide strip of treated lizard hide is wrapped around the grip or stock of the affixed weapon, augmenting the unease that your gunshot creates. When you activate it, you fire your gun into the air with the effects of [Warning Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3164). If you already have the Warning Shot feat, the target doesn't become temporarily immune to your [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53), potentially allowing you to Demoralize them again.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Admonishing Band
